abstract: Bank of China’s Shanghai-listed shares languished on Thursday, reflecting lingering concerns over the health of the sector after the bank obtained regulatory approval for an $8.8 billion share placement in Hong Kong and Shanghai, Reuters reported.
snippet: Bank of China’s Shanghai-listed shares languished on Thursday, reflecting lingering concerns over the health of the sector after the bank obtained regulatory approval for an $8.8 billion share placement in Hong Kong and Shanghai, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of China‘s Shanghai-listed shares languished on Thursday, reflecting lingering concerns over the health of the sector after the bank obtained regulatory approval for an $8.8 billion share placement in Hong Kong and Shanghai, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Approval of Share Offering Weighs on Bank of China
